title: Resurrection: A Channeled Text:
description: Knowledge and Insight from a World Apart from Our OwnResurrection is the first book in the groundbreaking new Manifestation Trilogy from renowned channel Paul Selig. Selig's unique gift is to channel the voice of the Guides, otherworldly beings of great wisdom and tremendous spiritual insight. Resurrection is composed of their raw, unedited words, as spoken by Paul. In it, he shares the new manifestation of humanity, a vision of alteration and elevation that will shift how we think and move through the world.Building on the success of his Beyond the Known series, this new trilogy will give readers a glimpse into the spiritual underpinnings that govern the world we live in. Resurrection is an astonishing invitation to rethink, reconstruct, and rebirth our world view in a transcendent way.
author: Paul Selig
